verbs.description: WASHINGTON -- [ARG0: The White House] [V: says] [ARG1: President Donald Trump " continues to actively prepare " for the president 's " expected summit " with North Korea leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore] .

WASHINGTON -- The White House says President Donald Trump " continues to actively prepare " for the president 's " [V: expected] [ARG1: summit] " with North Korea leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore .
